_header: Deem no thing that is in doubt
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 343; formerly listed as variant under 1112.
_description: A proverbial saying on finding out the truth before believing — one couplet

OxfBal354.Transcription:
Deme no thyng þat is in dowttill þe trowth be tried
                    owt
